text: The Karlsruhe Open is a WTA 125K series-level professional women's tennis tournament. It takes place on outdoor clay courts, around the months of July and August at the Tennis Club Rüppurr in the city of Karlsruhe in Germany. The prize money is $125,000. ==Results== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="140"|Score |- | 2020 || colspan="3" align="center" |- |2019 || Patricia Maria Țig || Alison Van Uytvanck || 3–6, 6–1, 6–2 |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="140"|Score |- | 2020 || colspan="3" align="center" |- |2019 || Lara Arruabarrena Renata Voráčová || Han Xinyun Yuan Yue || 6–7(2–7), 6–4, [10–4] |} ==References== ==External links== * Official Website Category:Tennis tournaments in Germany Category:clay court tennis tournaments Category:WTA 125K series Category:Annual events in Germany Category:2019 establishments in Germany Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019
title: Karlsruhe Open
